explains: abbr. 工商管理学硕士（Master of Business Administration）；海洋生物协会（Marine Biological Association）；主要战区（Main Battle Area）

sentences.en: Picture a typical MBA lecture theatre twenty years ago.
sentences.cn: 想象一下20年前一个典型的 MBA 大讲堂。

sentences.en: After attending Oregon, Knight moved on to do graduate work at Stanford University; his MBA thesis was on marketing athletic shoes.
sentences.cn: 从俄勒冈大学毕业后，奈特继续在斯坦福大学攻读研究生学位；他的MBA论文是关于运动鞋营销的。

sentences.en: According to Valerie Gauthier, associate dean at HEC Paris, the key lies in the process by which MBA programmes recruit their students.
sentences.cn: 巴黎高等商学院的副院长 Valerie Gauthier 表示，MBA 课程招生的过程是关键。
